titles.title: To amend the National Park Service Concessions Management Improvement Act of 1998 regarding certain small contracts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 4/23/2002--Introduced. Amends the National Park Service Concessions Management Improvement Act of 1998 to: (1) raise the gross annual receipt ceilings for National Park Service concessions contracts for which the Secretary of the Interior may grant a preferential right of renewal; and (2) prohibit applying a preferential right of renewal to concessioners that hold at least five such contracts or have aggregate gross annual receipts of $25 million or more from such contracts.
